verbs.description: Since [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: enacted] [ARG1: a " no - tolerance " policy for migrants attempting to cross the US - Mexico border] , ICE has separated at least 2,000 children from their parents , who are now in separate detention centers . Several groups are working to support them .
